section1.para: Based on a human rights index which measured the UK's compliance with its international human rights obligations, this book aims to provide a framework for monitoring and evaluating the impact of the Human Rights Act 1998 (the Act) which came into force on 2nd October, 2000 (PLC, 2000, XI(9), 7). The Act incorporates the European Convention on Human Rights (the Convention) into UK domestic law.
